Translations.Text: Day d lxelq nnwen i iwaaoen, ne$ d igenni mi t Ibna
Issuli lqus is, Iwezn it
Issebrek iv is; Issuffe$ ed tafat is
Deffir waya, Issewsaa tamurt
Issuffe$ ed segs aman is, akked tkessawt is
Idurar, Ioua ten
d l$it i kunwi, akw i lmal nnwen
Mara d tas twa$it tabarart
ayen ixdem umdan, a t id ismekti, assen
times a d tban i win ipwalin
Wanag win ijuoen
ismenyafen tameddurt n ddunit
Ihi, d times ay d uuoan
Wanag win iugaden ibeddi zdat Mass is, u ikkes cchawi i teowiet
ihi, d Loennet ay d uuoan
Steqsan k af yimir, melmi tisin is
Amek ara t id tdekoev, kecc
Ar Mass ik, agwav is
Kecc d aneddao kan i win it iugaden
Ihi, nitni, ass ideg ara t walin, amzun qqimen kan tameddit, ne$ tasebeit nni
